title: GUM Crayola Twistables Kids Toothbrush with Fun Twisting Head, Soft Bristles, Ages 3+ (Pack of 4) -230TT
description:
Product Description
Getting your kids excited about their daily tooth brushing routine requires more than just an ordinary kids toothbrush. Give them the fun and functional GUM Crayola Twistables Toothbrush for kids. It’s one of the best toothbrushes to keep kids engaged with bright and colorful handles, as well as a twistable head that can be extended from the toothbrush handle with a twist of the bottom green knob. When not in use, kids can twist the toothbrush back and store upside down in the included toothbrush cap. The cap doubles as a stand to keep the brush from rolling off the bathroom sink. This toothbrush also comes with soft, antibacterial bristles to further inhibit germ growth. The toothpaste sweet spot is highlighted by the colored bristles in the center of the compact head to teach children how much toothpaste they should be using. If you want to equip your little ones with a kids' toothbrush that will get them enthusiastic about their twice-daily tooth brushing routine, the GUM Crayola Twistable Toothbrush is what you need.
Manufacturer Contact Information
1-888-777-3116
features: EXTENDABLE TOOTHBRUSH HEAD: Twist the green knob on the handle to extend the compact toothbrush head for a fun and functional cleaning experience

KIDS TOOTHBRUSH CAP & STAND: Convenient antibacterial cap and stand to keep the brush from rolling off the sink. When it’s time to travel, pop the cap on top to cover the brush – perfect for road trips, camping, and sleepovers
CLINICALLY PROVEN BRISTLES: GUM Dome Trim brushes feature a raised center bristle design that provides greater contact with the tooth surface, while also reaching under the gum line
TOOTHPASTE SWEET SPOT: The compact head features colored centered soft bristles that teach children where to place their toothpaste and how much paste is needed
THE GUM MISSION: We are committed to helping people of all ages have stronger, healthier teeth, and gums by providing high quality, innovative oral care products that promote optimal dental health

reviews.title: Meh its ok
reviews.text: Its just a cheap what you would get for free at the kids dentist office kind of brush. Its totally flat but thats not a huge deal for me. The brush twisting gets my kids more into brushing their teeth but when I am brushing, the brush itself doesn't lock into place as as you are going around in their mouth and moving your hand it twists and doesn't stay in place. So I am typically adjusting at least once mid brush. Usually my kiddos are good about brushing but they have their days so its those days its really an issue for me. For the price it isn't worth it for me.

reviews.title: Great product! Decent price!
reviews.text: (Picture only shows three but there were four) adorable colors and tons of fun for my four year old. I thought they twisted all the way down but actually the head stays out then u use the stand as a cover which is what I needed since hes always knocking stuff off the bathroom sink. Will recommend to friends and family, and buy again in the future, really great product!

title: Milos Electric Toothbrush Replacement Heads for Kids, Oral B Compatible Pack of 16, Extra Soft Bristles, Fits for Electric Braun Brush Heads, Refill for Vitality Precision Sensitive and Clean Triumph
features: Compatible - Our toothbrush head set is versatile and compatible with most Braun and Oral B toothbrushes (excluding Oral B Pulsonic and iO).
Professional - Show those pearly whites with confidence! The flexible DuPont bristles on our toothbrush replacement brush heads are designed to remove plaque and promote healthy gums.
Convenient - Each brush on our kid toothbrush head replacement set has a color-coded ring at the bottom to make differentiation easy for the whole family.
Fading Bristles - Take the guesswork out of your hygiene routine. The colored bristles on these toothbrush refills fade to let you know when it's time for a replacement.
Pack Includes - This electric toothbrush head set comes with 16 replacements to make sure you stay on top of your oral health.

reviews.title: I just got it so I can't comment on durability, but...
reviews.text: This is much less expensive than Oral B brush heads. I contacted Oral B to tell them I thought their brush heads are exorbitantly priced, but they blamed it on supply chain issues. So apparently Milos is somehow not affected by supply chain issues. It kinda makes it seem like Oral B's response was B.S. Anyway, these heads I bought fit my Oral B ProHealth toothbrush. It's kind of weird that the bristles aren't all flush with one another, but they seem to work fine. I don't care that the colors don't match with the toothbrush body.

reviews.title: Cheap off brand
reviews.text: You will go through these fast as they seem to wear down super quick. They came fast and were cheap I need them quick as we ran out but I won't order them again.

title: Pop Sonic Electric Toothbrush with Travel Case (Teal) - Soft Electric Toothbrushes Keeps Mouth Fresh All-Day Toothbrush w/ 2 Speed - 18,000-24,000 Strokes/Minute Vibrations
features: Portable Electric Toothbrush With Case: Our battery operated toothbrush for adults and kids keeps your mouth fresh all day. This kit includes 1 x soft bristle electric toothbrush handle, 2 x Brush Heads with Nylon Bristles, 1 x Toothbrush Case, One AAA Battery, & Instruction Manual.

Gives Perfect Strokes: Our tooth brushes for teeth electric feature 2 speeds (to control your cleaning) with vibrations from 18,000 to 24,000 brush strokes per minute. These electric travel toothbrushes contain an easy-to-use on / off switch.

Styling Carrying Case: This portable toothbrush electric comes with its own carrying case making travel toothbrushes ideal for on-the-go oral care. The stylish electric toothbrush carrying case protects from unclean surfaces and avoids spillage from a wet toothbrush after use.

Great for Kids Too: With our whitening toothbrush, handy carrying case, and selection of bright colors, kids will love the Go Plus Sonic Toothbrush. Perfectly sized electric toothbrush for kids 8-12 or above that fits smaller hands for younger, more sensitive mouths.

Durable, Develop Healthy Brushing Habits: These oral hygiene products are programmed with a quadrant pacer and a 2-minute timer. Our travel electric toothbrushes for adults and kids are made with high-quality and long-lasting DuPont nylon bristles for longer life.

reviews.title: Nice toothbrush with a travel case
reviews.text: Nice toothbrush with a travel case. The vibrations are weaker than expected.  I like the timer.  We'll see if the dentist notices a difference.

reviews.title: Great toothbrush to take for travel
reviews.text: I hate when having to choose to use a regular stationary toothbrush, or my big rechargeable toothebrush when traveling. This toothbrush was perfect to take with me on my last trip as it is small, lightweight, sleek with the rose gold design, and comes with a really nice and compact case. Another huge plus is that it is really very quiet when it is on, so you don't risk having to wake others up. It is a great choice for a travel toothbrush.

reviews.title: It's just a vibrating toothbrush
reviews.text: This is really just a vibrating toothbrush.

reviews.title: I really love it
reviews.text: This toothbrush is perfect in every possible way.

reviews.title: great deal
reviews.text: Really cannot pick because of the price. Item as described and came with a very simple bib. These work as awesome teethers for my twins but in order to make it work for toothbrushing independence, you do need a cooperative toddler who's willing to bite down and keep the teeth between the brushes. If your kids are willing to bite down and brush with these, they work great for encouraging toddlers to maintain healthy dental hygiene. I think it's already awesome for the price and works great as a teether.

title: grabease Double-Sided Toothbrush for Ages 6 Months to 4 Years, Soft Bristles & Choke Protection Shield, BPA-Free, 1 Pack, Yellow
features: INDEPENDENT TOOTHBRUSHING: Introducing our game-changing toothbrush designed for independent toothbrushing in babies, toddlers, and preschool kids aged 6 months to 4 years! With its two-sided design, this toothbrush encourages a positive approach to oral hygiene. The pack includes one double-sided toothbrush that's perfect for little hands, and a silicone finger brush for gentle gum massage. This toddler toothbrush is ideal for a child's first toothbrush, making dental care fun and easy.

DOUBLE-SIDED TOOTHBRUSH: Our toothbrush is designed to give your child a dazzling smile in no time! The innovative, tapered bristles on both sides of this brush offer maximum contact with teeth - perfect for easily-distracted little ones. Plus, a bonus finger toothbrush is included, ideal for infants, and kids experiencing sensory or sensitivity issues. Ensure your child's dental care starts off strong with our versatile brush set.

SOFT BRISTLES & CHOKE PROTECTION: Our patented design ensures a safe, mess-free tooth cleaning experience for both toddlers and parents. With a built-in choke barrier, the Brush prevents over-insertion and gagging. The soft, flexible bristles are gentle on tender gums and new baby teeth. This versatile toothbrush is a must-have for your baby's first dental care kit - perfect for toddlers, first-time brushers, and those transitioning from finger toothbrushes.

EXPERT APPROVED: Specially designed for infants and toddlers, our patented toothbrush has the seal of approval from top pediatric dentists. With endorsements from the American Academy of Pediatric Dentistry, you can trust that our product is perfect for your child's needs. Remember to replace every 3-4 months for optimal oral hygiene. Shop with confidence, as our brushes ensure a safe, effective start to your baby's dental journey. Order spares or stock up now!

CERTIFIED SAFE: Meticulously lab-tested to meet the most stringent USA safety standards for your baby's wellbeing. Our toothbrushes are 100% BPA, lead, and phthalate-free, ensuring your child's safety as they learn proper oral hygiene. Guide your child with our double-sided toothbrush designed specifically for their needs - from their first tooth to confident self-brushing as a toddler. Create healthy habits under your loving supervision with Grabease.

reviews.title: Not a primary toothbrush
reviews.text: It’s hard-to-impossible to clean the front of my 18 month olds teeth with this. It’s too big. I can use a different brush for that, and then give this to him to “play with” for a few minutes. He makes gagging sounds but it is safe, of course; it’s just much bigger than other baby brushes. I’d save for older toddlers and even then it might be hard for fronts of teeth.

title: Oral-B Sensitive Clean Electric Toothbrush Head with Clean & Care Technology, Extra Soft Bristles for Gentle Plaque Removal, Pack of 12, Suitable for Mailbox, White
description: As one of Oral-B’s premium replacement toothbrush heads, the Sensitive Clean features ultrathin bristles that are gentle on gums, combined with regular bristles that are tough on plaque. Sensitive Clean removes up to 100% more plaque and reduces gum inflammation by 100% compared to a manual toothbrush. The unique combination of end rounded and ultrathin bristles make Sensitive Clean ideal for everyone with a sensitive mouth and everyone who is looking for just a great gentle clean. Compatible with all Oral-B handles except Pulsonic & iO.
features: Easy delivery: 12 counts of Oral-B Sensitive Clean toothbrush head in a mailbox compatible and non-printed recyclable packaging
With Clean Maximiser technology, green bristles turn yellow when it is time to replace your brush head
Up to 100 Percent more plaque removal and healthier gums vs. a regular manual toothbrush
Oral-B’s best for whole mouth cleaning (excluding Oral-B iO)
Dentists recommend to change brush head every 3 months for the best clean

reviews.title: If you have sensitive gums, buy this OEM Oral-B Toothbrush Head vs Chinese After-Market
reviews.text: My wife has sensitive gums.  These OEM Oral-B toothbrush heads are much softer but still do the job vs supposedly equivalent "sensitive" Chinese After-Market heads.  While the Chinese after-market toothbrush heads are much cheaper, they contributed to my wife's $2,000. gum surgery.  I swapped back to OEM Oral-B brush heads and all is now good for her.  Live and learn I guess or, better yet, you get what you pay for.  Buy these OEM Oral-B toothbrush heads with confidence.

title: Oral-B Stages Power Kids Disney Frozen Battery Toothbrush with Timer App
description:
Product Description
The Oral B Stages Power Battery toothbrush is designed especially for children. With fun, colourful designs and soft bristles, the toothbrush is a fun way for kids to learn. Assorted models dispatched.
Directions

features: Designed to help children brush teeth longer and better - appropriate for children aged 3 years +
The rotating brush head has a raised center row to clean chewing surfaces where cavities tend to form

reviews.title: Edit: Good for my 2 year old
reviews.text:
I realize it says it's a kids toothbrush but it's huge! It's bigger than a regular sized brush for adults. I intended this for my 2 year old for Christmas. It's my fault for not looking at details. I've been searching for an Olaf one and this was on sale. I have not tried it but will update when we do...

Update: I gave this to my daughter early because she saw Olaf. It does fit in her mouth and the on/off buttons are easy for her to push. It's her favorite color, purple. She actually brushes her teeth. Well the toothbrush does the work! I don't see a timer on it. So far, the battery is doing fine. My biggest concern is replacing the head. It's already looking like I should replace.

reviews.title: getting hard to find these
reviews.text: it's getting hard to find these brushes WITHOUT the stupid rubber parts on the sides, so when i find them, i buy a few packs.  these are better than the last ones i had - there's a rough texture on the back of the brush head (raised less than 1mm) that feels nice against the inside of my cheek while brushing - probably also good to clean your tongue.

reviews.title: Wonderful toothbrushes.
reviews.text: Works great and does not flex, very sturdy.

reviews.title: I like the feel of this toothbrush- BUT....
reviews.text:
Within maybe a week to 10 days, it already looks worn out and may not be cleaning as well. I may try a 2nd brush but if it's not any better, these are going back to the big box store that starts with a C that I bought them at.

Not sure if the medium would be better or not. I may call Oral B and/or I may try another brand and/or return them.

features: Premium Quality and Safe Guarantee - Our Electric Toothbrush heads have passed certification, and brush heads come with sealed container for hygienic storage, effectively protect your toothbrush head from outside pollution, it is a best gift for women, man, or yourself.

Extra-Soft Bristles - The extra-soft bristles, so your child can get a thorough clean as they learn proper oral care habits. Ideal for ages 3+, the design is perfect for a smaller mouth, putting a powerful yet gentle clean in their growing hands.
All Round Clean - Round brush head is inspired by dental professional tools for a tooth-by-tooth clean, with specially engineered bristles for optimal tooth coverage

reviews.title: Check the size
reviews.text: Disappointed, I read it wrong and thought these were official oral b replacement heads. It’s smaller than the original one on my sons toothbrush and just doesn’t feel durable. I guess time will tell.

reviews.title: Bristles are harder than advertised.
reviews.text:
The description states that it has 'Extra-Soft Bristles' which is why I purchased it.
I've found this is not the case.
They are not the hardest bristles, but they're not as soft as advertised.

reviews.title: Were they kidding?
reviews.text:
Not soft at all.
Has a piece that sticks out of the middle.
Totally inappropriate for children!
To be used with an Oral-B toothbrush that is so harsh?
I contacted the seller before I bought but never got a reply.

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.text: Good deal compared to buying name brand but they do feel like cheap plastic and they’re not the softest. Worth it though to save some money if you want to change them out as often as you should. The oral b brand replacements are too expensive IMO.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.text: Son likes the different color. Fits his oral b toothbrush well. Perfect for little ones teeth. Thank you

I even took it with me when I traveled.  It comes with a cord for recharging and I haven’t found any problems with it at all. I’m very happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Soft!

reviews.title: Best toothbrush evef
reviews.text: This is the best toothbrush I've ever had. Nice big head that cleans many surfaces at once. Very soft. So many newer toothbrushes have tiny heads, and I wasn't getting my teeth clean with them, including with an electric toothbrush. My teeth are much cleaner and whiter after less than a month using it. I see some plaque disappearing as well.

reviews.title: This toothbrush is soft and firm

reviews.title: Toddler loves this.
reviews.text: We use this to help brushing teeth during the daytime a breeze, as our 3 year old can do it himself. Then at night, do his teeth ourselves. It's come in very handy!

title: Brush Buddies Hot Wheels Toothbrush for Kids, Kids Toothbrushes, Toothbrush Pack, Soft Bristle Toothbrushes for Kids, Toddler Toothbrush Ages 2-4, 6PK
description: It’s never too early to introduce a healthy oral care routine— start with Brush Buddies Hot Wheels Toothbrushes! Each pack includes 6 soft bristle toothbrushes with a variety of colors and designs for a fun addition to your little one’s mornings and evenings. Each children’s toothbrush features a small, rounded brush head and textured ergonomic handle for easy grip. The bristles are gentle enough to effectively clean while protecting your child’s sensitive gums and enamel.
features: [What's Included] The Brush Buddies Hot Wheels Manual Toothbrush Pack includes 6 multi-colored Hot Wheels kid's toothbrushes.
[Ultra-Gentle] Each soft bristle toothbrush features a rounded brush head for effective, gentle cleaning while protecting your child's delicate gums and enamel.

[Great for Toddlers] Brush Buddies Hot Wheels Toothbrushes are a great introduction to oral care for your toddlers and young children! The small head size and ergonomic handles are ideal for little ones as they learn to brush their teeth.
[Make Brushing Fun] With bright colors and unique car designs, the children's toothbrushes are sure to make every morning a fun and exciting routine.
[Rotate Regularly] Although dentists recommend a new toothbrush every 90 days, it's important to swap your child's toothbrush after they get sick, too!

reviews.title: No good
reviews.text:
I ordered this for my son, and he loved it so much! He had fun brushing his teeth and did such a good job.
For like 2 weeks.
The battery is not waterproofed, so it is all getting wet every time you brush and rinse. So now it doesn't work. I thought it was just a dead battery, but nope. It all got wet and is ruined.
I'm super disappointed. You would think something like a toothbrush would be better sealed to prevent such a thing from happening. And of course, it died right after the return deadline.
Save yourself the money and drama of explaining to a toddler why he can't use his Blippi brush anymore.

reviews.title: good value
reviews.text: for my grandson he loved them

reviews.title: Works as needed.
reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These kids toothbrushes aren’t expensive and what you receive is good value for the money. Yes, some of the toothbrushes get loosened fibers over time, but we don’t keep them long enough to reach that point. The more aggressive of a brusher you are, the quicker you need to replace them. I find that they don’t last 3 months with good consistent brushing, as the quality declines with usage. Overall I’m happy with these for my son, just remember to switch them out within three months. The design is a great bonus for kids that enjoy HotWheels!

reviews.title: good purchase
reviews.text: good purchase but if you have a toddler who likes to chew on the bristles then you’ll realize the bristles can come out.. so just watch out

reviews.title: Good cheap toddler toothbrushes.
reviews.text: My toddler destroys and flattens bristles. These are cheap enough that It doesn’t break the bank when she needs a new one every few weeks. Bristles also don’t fall out. Will order again.

reviews.title: Three Stars

reviews.title: the Artists' (Tooth) Brush
reviews.text:
these tooth brushes are so pretty. the heads are dwarfed by the handles, but the heads are the perfect size for my mouth and the handles are the perfect size for my hands, so no complaints. been using one for the last two days, with charcoal toothpaste and tooth powder. the black bristles make it a bit harder to see when the brush is totally cleaned after brushing, but not so much that it's a problem.

the bristles are great and leave my mouth feeling squeaky clean, but I wish the heads were replaceable because the carved handles are amazing. extremely comfortable, too. I'll definitely start a collection as the bristles die, then (after sawing off the heads) sand them down and use them for something decorative. they're far too pretty to toss in the garbage.

ever since discovering bamboo fabrics a couple of years ago I've been on a bamboo kick for any and everything possible. it's long been one of my favorite plants (and the first thing I planted here at my home), and that it's sustainable/environmentally friendly has made it my go-to. hadn't even considered that there might be toothbrushes made of bamboo, but the minute I saw them I grabbed them. HIGHly recommended. bamboo is the wave of the future!

Soft bristles are gentle on your teeth and gums and provide comfort and control when brushing. A built in tongue cleaner helps finish cleaning your whole mouth for a clean finish. When done use the provided toothbrush hygiene cap cover to keep it sanitized and ready to use next time. featuresblue, green, red and purple included Soft 35 bristles that are gentle on your teeth and gumsz-shaped bristles designed to reach in between teeth contoured ergonomic handle for easy us age built in tongue cleaner for total cleanlinesstootbrush hygiene cap cover
